Summary: The Isolette shall include an independent regulator function that maintains the Current Temperature inside the Isolette within the Desired Temperature Range.
Content: The Isolette shall include an independent regulator function that maintains the Current Temperature inside the Isolette within the Desired Temperature Range.

Summary: The Isolette shall include an independent monitor function that activates an Alarm when a safety violation occurs
Content: The Isolette shall include an independent monitor function that activates an Alarm when a safety violation occurs

Summary: The alarm shall be activated when the Current Temperature falls below or rises above the Alarm Temperature Range.
Content: The alarm shall be activated when the Current Temperature falls below or rises above the Alarm Temperature Range.

Summary: The alarm shall be activated when the Current Temperature or the Alarm Temperature Range is flagged as invalid.
Content: The alarm shall be activated when the Current Temperature or the Alarm Temperature Range is flagged as invalid.

Summary: The alarm shall be activated when an internal failure has been detected in the monitor function.
Content: The alarm shall be activated when an internal failure has been detected in the monitor function.
